title: INR5,000 a ticket this year vs. INR12,000 last year: bad Dussehra rubs in the downturn for airlines
text:
The week around Dussehra, which marks the onset of the lucrative festive season for airlines, has turned out to be lukewarm, confirming what airlines were reluctant to admit: the slowdown hasn’t spared aviation. On the Durga Puja days, a ticket to Kolkata would cost above INR10,000. This time airlines couldn’t raise fares.
